title: Taliyah's login theme: isn't it so beautiful?
body:
i was so tired pressing ''loop'' at her homecoming trailer, my soul is finally free.
Her login screen is actually so inspiring with that voice, isn't it?

for once i'm happy to say : so damn well done job riot!!

replies.body: I really was expecting this video to be darude sandstorm...
I love this animation.
anyone know where to find original singers of login themes? im always quite curious as to who the voices belong to.
Thank you so much for your comments!  Really happy that you like her login theme. :)
If the lore ever progresses to have her clear things up with Azir and they become pals... could we please get a mashup/rearrangement of the two together?
THIS IS SO BEAUTIFUL IM SO EXCITED FOR HER RELEASE AHAHAHAHAHAAIAWUEBJGNLDVEAKJ
why the fuck she look so nervous while casually rock surfing
Because in theory, she's cruising down to Shurmia to check on her parents who may or may not be enslaved
Pretty sure it sounds like Taliyah's VA. It would make sense since she's presumably humming some sort of song that reminds her of Shurima, her homeland.
It reminds me of this track from the ORI OST https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cx06VKCP8z0
so calm this might be better than the mech zero sion one
if you want to listen to this song on repeat just find it on youtube then replace the url with listenonrepeat where it has youtube in it.
Op you know you can right click and loop it forever you don't need to keep pushing the loop button

I love the login theme a lot, but me personally? I want another theme like "Get Jinxed" that I can sing along to. I love Get Jinxed, World's Collide, Warriors.... I want RIOT to team up with more bands for music I can sing along with. I love warsongs, Taliyah's theme, and all the other music, but please RIOT give me something to sing to!
Somehow reminds me of Hiroyuki Sawano lol
A lil' bit. his Aldnoah.Zero soundtrack was amazing honestly. w/out a doubt my fav
The guy who does Blue Exorcist and Guilty Crown? Yeah, I can definitely see it.
My god, this is fantastic

Already replaced the default login with it. _Copy-paste from PBE client install too stronk!_
Recently also used it to replace my custom Nami login, playing "Enya - Caribbean Blue" too.
This is my favorite one.
Best music I have ever heard in a while. The excitement in the beats, beautiful voice, and nature feel from this song is just amazing
Rocks never bend. They crumble into more rocks.

Just gave it a listen and it's gorgeous! One of my new favorites; whoever the singer is has a beautiful voice. 

To me, it starts out with her surfing on her rock making her way to Shurima. She is deep in thought as the world rushes by her as she makes it closer and closer to home. The music gets faster, Taliyah is racing up a hill. A pause in the music. Taliyah reaches the peek of the hill and sees the vast Shuriman desert spread out before her with the Sun Disc raised high into the sky. 

Riot never fails when it comes to music imo! Great job Riot!
